name: ArchiveStreamProtocol
desc: A set of methods that defines the interface for using an archive stream that reads from and writes to data blobs.

items.name: func readBlob(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, into: UnsafeMutableRawBufferPointer)
items.desc: Reads the current entry blob data.

items.name: func close()
items.desc: Closes the stream and releases associated resources.
